Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring procedural world generation and real-time interactions. Players explore deep caves to collect valuable resources while managing equipment upgrades and collaborating with others through MQTT networking. The application includes complex systems for inventory management, thermal physics modeling, and persistent game state saving across sessions.
